Interface TenantResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Clusters, Hosts, Projects, Vcenters

    public interface TenantResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>

      Gets the resources associated with a given tenant.

        See Also:

      • listByTenant

        java.util.List<NamedRelatedResourceRep> listByTenant(java.net.URI tenantId)
        Lists resources associated with a given tenant.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - the tenant ID.
        Returns:
        the list of resource references.

      • getByTenant

        java.util.List<T> getByTenant(java.net.URI tenantId)
        Gets the resources associated with a given tenant.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - the tenant ID.
        Returns:
        the list of resources for this tenant.
        See Also:
        Resources.getByRefs(java.util.Collection)

      • getByTenant

        java.util.List<T> getByTenant(java.net.URI tenantId,
                            ResourceFilter<T> filter)
        Gets the resources associated with a given tenant, optionally filtering the results as they are returned.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - the tenant ID.
        filter - the resource filter to apply to the results as they are returned (optional).
        Returns:
        the list of resources for the tenant.
        See Also:
        Resources.getByRefs(java.util.Collection, ResourceFilter)
